channel.title: GitHub on Crismar.Me
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Crismar.Me

item.title: July & August 2017: My first PRs
item.description: So last time I mentioned I was looking to contribute to the Kubernetes project. After an initially steep learning curve, I’ve managed to get two PRs approved on Service Catalog, a Kubernetes incubator project. Here’s how that happened. How I got started I was looking for a good place to start on the k8s project. Coincidentally, I came across a tweet by @TheNikhita and decided to reach out and ask her about her experience and tips contributing to k8s.
